pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, June 21, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community celebration for National Indigenous Peoples Day and deliver brief remarks.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Kigali, Rwanda.

Shell Aerocentre
MacDonald-Cartier International Airport

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.
